executive_summary: Figures have been adjusted for inflation and are presented in 2024 currency. A long-term shift in consumer perceptions has underpinned growth as mainstream consumers increasingly accept psychic services. Traditional skepticism about consulting psychics has waned, with more consumers embracing these services, especially in times of uncertainty. The pandemic significantly boosted demand for services as many turned to spiritual guidance to navigate their anxieties about health, finances and the loss of loved ones. This uptick reflects a broader trend towards personalized and spiritual approaches to life's challenges, making psychic services a more mainstream part of many people's lives. Revenue expanded at a CAGR of 4.3% over the years to 2024 to $2.3 billion, including a growth of 0.7% in 2024.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Interest in Supernatural Practices is a Mainstay for a Subsegment of the Nation's Population
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Through the end of 2029, revenue is expected to continue rising, growing at a CAGR of 1.9% to $2.5 billion. Improving economic conditions will continue to boost industry performance as rising disposable income bolsters average customer spending on psychic services. Health consciousness and the holistic wellness movement will sustain interest in psychic services as consumers seek ways to integrate physical, mental and emotional well-being. The appeal of stress alleviation and spiritual guidance will keep psychic services in demand. Younger generations, especially those under 25, exhibit increasing curiosity about new-age practices. Their familiarity with mobile and online platforms aligns perfectly with the expanding accessibility of psychic services, ensuring a steady influx of young clients.

Primary motivations for consulting psychics include romantic and financial advice, emotional distress after a relative's death and spiritual guidance. Following the pandemic, business closures, sickness and loss of loved ones prompted a surge in demand for spiritual guidance services as consumers felt uneasy about the future.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Over 20.0% of Americans consult a psychic or fortune-teller
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: According to a Pew Research Center survey, over 20.0% of Americans consult a psychic or fortune-teller, but that number grows when stressed consumers are desperate for answers.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: HEALTH-CONSCIOUSNESS AND SELF-CARE TRENDS SUPPORT DEMAND FOR PSYCHIC SERVICES
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: There will be a growing interest in comprehensive health solutions that extend beyond traditional wellness regimes. The shift towards holistic wellness, in which physical, mental and emotional well-being are interconnected, will elevate interest in psychic services. As the US population becomes more health-conscious over the next five years, consumers will seek more ways to alleviate stress and find solutions to life's challenges. Psychic services will provide them with the additional guidance and support they need.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: GROWTH DEPENDS ON ENTICING THE YOUNGER GENERATION
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Although typically skeptical, those under 25 will continue to show a growing interest in astrology and tarot reading. This age demographic poses an ideal opportunity for psychic services thanks to their lower religious affiliation rate. Spirituality is important nonetheless, with many identifying as "spiritual but not religious," according to the Pew Research Center. Gen Z's proficiency with mobile and online applications will align with their expanding interest in traditional psychic services. The rising accessibility of psychic services will contribute to greater participation from younger consumers as they become more open to spiritual practices.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Many Psychics Will Rely On Their Online Presence
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: As older consumers, who primarily receive psychic services on the phone, age out of the market, psychics will have to find new clients. Websites, search engine optimization and a strong social media presence will be crucial for enhancing operator reputability and increasing market reach. Alexander Dunlop, founder of the Spiritual Nutrition Center, expects over half of new clients to continue finding the Center through online articles and popular review sites like Yelp. The overwhelming majority of revenue is earned through traditional in-person sessions.

industry_definition: Psychic services include establishments that offer psychic and fortune-telling services. Psychics typically provide services in the areas of astrology, aura reading, mediumship, tarot card reading and palmistry, among other metaphysical services.
key_trends: Barriers to entry for psychic services are low. The number of psychics has grown over the past five years, leading to high competition within the industry.

To compete with preexisting psychics in the industry, new entrants must develop a quality reputation to gain and retain clients. Over the next few years, increased regulation could heighten barriers to entry for psychics.

Psychic services saw minimal loss despite an economic downturn. Rising unemployment and financial concerns led many consumers to seek pressing financial and career advice from psychics, reflecting a notable trend in consumer behavior.

Younger generations will support growth in the coming years. Consumers under 29 will show interest in astrology and tarot because of their "spiritual but not religious" mindset. Their comfort with technology and online platforms will make psychic services more accessible.
The industry is highly fragmented. Most psychics are nonemployers, accounting for less than 5.0% of industry revenue.
Regulations aim to bring professionalism to the industry. From background checks to specific service categories, these measures.
Trade associations are crucial for professional psychics. These groups offer networking opportunities and foster professional connections that are invaluable for business growth.
Different types of operations have different costs. The scale of operations matters, as bigger operations tend to have higher profit, so scaling up can be a smart move.

The regions with the greatest concentration of establishments include the Southeast, Western, Mid-Atlantic and Great Lakes regions. Psychic establishments are located near large population centers to grow the size of their client base.

Astrology and aura reading are leveraging digital platforms to extend their reach. Thanks to easy access via mobile apps and social media platforms, personalized reports and virtual readings are gaining traction with younger consumers.
Consumers over 65 aren't just wealthy; they're loyal, often meeting with the same psychic for years.

market_segmentation.segment_description: The continued technological expansion of mobile apps and the internet will mainly continue to boost access to psychics for consumers aged 18 to 29. Since nearly 80.0% of individuals in this bracket are single, they like to use services to determine their romantic future, as many people use psychic services for insight into relationships.

Consumers in this age group are more financially established than 18- to 29-year-olds and have more discretionary income to spend on psychic services. According to a Pew Research survey, 17.0% of people in this age group reported consulting a psychic or fortune-teller. Many of these consumers also use psychic services to determine their professional future, further boosting demand from this demographic.

This age demographic is financially well-established and has the disposable income to spend on psychic services, boosting demand for psychic services. According to Census data, under 20.0% of adults in this age group are divorced. Therefore, individuals in this age group are concerned with relationships.

This age demographic comprises well-established individuals with the necessary disposable income to spend on industry services. Many of the users in this demographic are repeat clients who have chosen to return to the same psychic for several years. According to the survey conducted by Pew Research, an estimated 12.0% of people aged 65 years old and up reported consulting a psychic or fortune teller.

products_and_services.product_description: Palmistry involves interpreting the lines, shapes, wrinkles and curves on the palms to provide insights into an individual's life and future.
Cartomancy uses decks of cards, like tarot or oracle cards, to predict the future and offer guidance. Tarot reading is one of the most popular forms of cartomancy.
An aura is a field of subtle, luminous radiation surrounding a person. Aura reading involves examining a person's energy field to gain insights into their emotional and spiritual state.
Astrologists claim expertise in mapping the positions of the planets, the 12 signs of the zodiac and the 12 houses of the horoscope at the exact moment of a client's birth.

Mediumship involves communicating with the spirits of deceased individuals to provide comfort and messages to the living. The emotional and spiritual support that mediumship services provide attracts a loyal customer base, boosting revenue.
Animal communicators are hired to telepathically communicate with dead or alive animals. They help clients communicate with their pets to understand their needs and behaviors.
Other services include lithomancy, numerology and psychometry.

demand_determinants.determinant_description: Per capita disposable income directly influences the industry's performance. Higher disposable income means people have more financial flexibility to spend on nonessential services like psychic readings. When disposable income rises, demand for services typically rises, representing an opportunity for the industry. Conversely, lower disposable income can reduce spending on these services, impacting the industry's profitability.

business_locations.location_description: The Southeast hosts the highest number of psychic services and the largest population share. Population density has risen over the past decade, leading to more psychic establishments. The region's high tourism rates, particularly in cities like New Orleans and Miami, create a demand for unique and mystical experiences, leading to a higher concentration of psychic establishments.

The Western region has been a hub for New Age and holistic health movements, creating a demand for psychic services as part of broader spiritual and wellness practices. California is known for its openness to New Age and alternative spiritual practices. Thanks to large consumer markets in Los Angeles, San Francisco and San Diego, California hosts the largest share of establishments.

The Mid-Atlantic region, including cities like New York and Philadelphia, is known for its diverse population. The area's rich history with various immigrant communities has contributed to a tradition of esoteric practices and spiritual exploration, maintaining a steady interest in psychic services. The high population density in major cities creates a larger market for niche services, including psychics, as more people seek personalized guidance and alternative spiritual experiences. Psychics tend to be located near large metropolitan centers because of the large consumer bases in these areas.

regulations_points.regulation_description: State and local laws regulate psychic services in the US. Many areas require specific permits or licenses to ensure compliance. Regulations often include background checks, operational hour restrictions and adherence to defined service categories like fortune-telling and tarot reading.

Regulations affecting psychic services in the US include truth-in-advertising laws and privacy protections. These laws ensure providers can't make fraudulent claims or guarantees about their services. By requiring transparency and honesty, these regulations protect clients from misleading information, ensuring transactions are fair.

basis_points.basis_title: Barriers to entry for psychic services are low
basis_points.basis_description: The number of psychics has grown over the past five years, leading to high competition within the industry. To compete with preexisting psychics in the industry, new entrants must develop a quality reputation to gain and retain clients.

basis_points.basis_title: Over the next few years, increased regulation could heighten barriers to entry for psychics
basis_points.basis_description: Over the next few years, increased regulation could heighten barriers to entry for psychics.

concentration_points.concentration_title: Psychic Services have a low level of market share concentration
concentration_points.concentration_description: Most psychics and fortune-tellers are small nonemployers with a negligible share of total industry revenue. Based on data from the US Census Bureau, IBISWorld estimates that less than 1.0% of industry establishments employ workers.

The trend toward greater citywide licensing regulation heightens industry consolidation slightly. Psychic services' level of market share concentration will remain low because of the industry's minimal barriers to entry.

cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Wages typically make up the largest proportion of revenue. The industry is highly service-oriented and labor-intensive.
Rental costs represent another major cost. Psychics are typically located in high-traffic areas with convenient accessibility for their clients, making rent expenses high for the industry.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: Psychic services are labor-intensive, relying heavily on employees to conduct readings. This dependency on skilled labor necessitates ongoing investment in human resources, which impacts operational costs.

volatility_points.volatility_title: Psychic Services Have Experienced a Medium Revenue Volatility Level
volatility_points.volatility_description: Psychic services are relatively resistant to economic declines because consumers seek these services for financial advice during economic downturns. When the economy performs well, clients have more income to spend on discretionary services like psychic readings, benefiting growth.

volatility_points.volatility_title: The Industry Benefits From Shifts in Consumer Perceptions Regarding Psychic Services
volatility_points.volatility_description: Psychic services have become increasingly mainstream and accepted among more consumers. There is a gradual, long-term shift in customers' views toward psychic services, especially among the younger generations.

technological_change_points.technological_change_title: Webcam Reading or Video Chat Reading is the Most Recently Emerged Form of Psychic Reading
technological_change_points.technological_change_description: Live reading helps to provide a real-time, live connection between the psychic and the client. This form of connection has climbed in popularity in recent years, especially during the pandemic, as it permits all channels of connection in real-time.

FAQs.question: Psychics with a diverse range of services at lower prices than competitors will gain a significant market advantage. Does your company provide a wide array of services or focus on one corner of the market?
FAQs.answer: Industry operators typically provide services in the areas of astrology, aura reading, mediumship, tarot card reading and palmistry, among other metaphysical services.

FAQs.question: Do your company's sales depend on the overall health of the US economy?
FAQs.answer: Industry operators can benefit from both cyclical and countercyclical demand, as demand for industry services tends to increase during economic downturns as consumers seek financial advice.

FAQs.question: Is your company investing in R&D to cater to consumer preferences?
FAQs.answer: Successful industry players have increasingly relied on a strong technological presence to capture the younger market; as a result, popular social media platforms, email newsletters and other electronic communications methods have grown in importance, leading to increased investment.

FAQs.question: Is your company located in proximity to key end markets?
FAQs.answer: Psychic establishments are generally located near large population centers for industry operators to increase the size of their client base; as a result, industry activity is most highly concentrated in the Southeast, Western and Mid-Atlantic regions.

FAQs.question: Has your company been able to reduce wage costs by adopting technology?
FAQs.answer: The industry is fundamentally service-oriented, relying on skilled psychics to provide readings to customers; this is unlikely to change soon, with wages comprising a majority of annual industry revenue.

FAQs.question: How is your company leveraging social media technology to increase its online presence?
FAQs.answer: Social media and review sites have become essential to enhancing the reputability of industry players, with many industry operators increasing investments in technology during the current period.

FAQs.question: How does your company ensure all health and safety standards are upheld?
FAQs.answer: Noncompliant psychic services providers will be subject to higher insurance costs and premiums, hindering profitability for such operators.

FAQs.question: Is your company prepared to meet shifting regulatory standards surrounding licenses?
FAQs.answer: Although pricing varies, an increasing number of regulations are attempting to limit fraud in the industry, with many cities requiring psychics to purchase licenses to practice their services.

FAQs.question: How does your company's profit margin compare to those of your competitors?
There is no significant seasonality in industry services, so the industry does not have to compensate for seasonal cash flows.
FAQs.answer: There is no significant seasonality in industry services, so the industry does not have to compensate for seasonal cash flows.

FAQs.question: Due to the high level of competition among industry enterprises, the ability to develop niche markets is becoming more important. The more services that an operator can provide, the more likely they are to gain a wider variety of clients because they can cater to a larger group's needs. Which niches, if any, do you cater to? How can you diversify your product mix? How do you keep track of the latest trends?
FAQs.answer: Due to the high level of competition among industry enterprises, the ability to develop niche markets is becoming more important. The more services that an operator can provide, the more likely they are to gain a wider variety of clients because they can cater to a larger group's needs.

FAQs.question: Clients will choose a psychic based on word-of-mouth recommendations; providing consistency in service standards and ensuring a high level of client satisfaction leads to higher return rates and increased business. Are you known for your reliability and performance? Have you had any problems with reliability in the past?
FAQs.answer: Clients will choose a psychic based on word-of-mouth recommendations; providing consistency in service standards and ensuring a high level of client satisfaction leads to higher return rates and increased business.

FAQs.question: Making customer loyalty and reputation an important aspect in keeping a competitive advantage. What do you do to promote loyalty and to keep your customers returning? Do you offer special discounts or a high-caliber client experience?
FAQs.answer: Having a good reputation and receiving positive word-of-mouth recommendations from clients is important given the high level of competition within the industry.

FAQs.question: Many enterprises in the industry earn revenue though repeat business; therefore, it is important for psychics to have a loyal customer base.
FAQs.answer: Many enterprises in the industry earn revenue though repeat business; therefore, it is important for psychics to have a loyal customer base.

FAQs.question: As women account for the majority of industry demand, the labor force participation rate of women is generally positively correlated with industry revenue. How many of your customers are women? Do you market your services to working women?
FAQs.answer: According to Pew Research Center, women are twice as likely as men to visit a psychic. As more women enter the workforce, they are able to afford a greater number of discretionary services, such as psychic readings.

FAQs.question: Do you have plans to diversify your customer base? Have you tried advertising in a variety of outlets to diversify your customer base?
The industry's largest target market includes individuals aged 30 to 64. When the number of adults in this age bracket increases, the industry is positively affected.
FAQs.answer: The industry's largest target market includes individuals aged 30 to 64. When the number of adults in this age bracket increases, the industry is positively affected.

FAQs.question: Improved disposable income will foster growth in demand for industry services. Do you expect major changes in demand as a result of rising disposable income levels? Are you prepared for an uptick in demand?
Given that psychic services are relatively discretionary, industry revenue is positively correlated with trends in per capita disposable income.
FAQs.answer: Given that psychic services are relatively discretionary, industry revenue is positively correlated with trends in per capita disposable income.
